statements: UPDATE geofence_alerts SET alert_message = 'New Entry Alert' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE geofence_alerts SET geofence_name = 'Backyard' , geofence_type = 'entry' , alert_message = 'Alert: Backyard Entry' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE geofence_alerts SET geofence_name = 'Home', alert_message = 'Welcome back home!' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE geofence_alerts SET alert_timestamp = '2022-10-25 08:00:00', geofence_type = 'entry' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE geofence_areas SET latitude = 37.7749, longitude = -122.4194, area_name = 'San Francisco' WHERE id = '9a50fb31-45e3-48c3-bb8b-9a501eba247b';
UPDATE user_geofence_alerts SET alert_time = '2022-05-15 08:30:00', alert_type = 'Exit' WHERE id = 'c91fe3a1-b0c6-41d1-82e6-8a916d139453';
UPDATE geofence_areas SET area_name = 'New Area Name', latitude = 12.345, longitude = 98.765 WHERE id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-9876-abcdef123456';

UPDATE user_geofence_alerts SET alert_type = 'Intrusion Detected', alert_time = '2022-09-15 14:30:00' WHERE user_id = '9876abcd-5678-4321-8765-dcba98765432' AND geofence_area_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-9876-abcdef123456';
UPDATE geofence_alerts SET area_name = 'Restricted Area' WHERE alert_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE user_id = 2002;
UPDATE geofence_alerts SET area_name = 'Restricted Area', alert_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE alert_id = 123;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE geofences SET radius = 200 WHERE geofence_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE users SET phone = '+123456789' WHERE user_id = 'xyz456';
UPDATE geofences SET radius = 200, area_name = 'Updated Area' WHERE geofence_id = 'a6f3ee7c-3567-4f5a-9718-c138b29e3492';
UPDATE alerts SET message = 'New Message', timestamp = '2022-05-20 10:30:00', is_active = TRUE WHERE alert_id = '6ca94bf5-361e-4f03-a47c-967c11e4d8b0';
UPDATE geofence_areas SET area_description = 'Updated description' WHERE area_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE geofence_areas SET area_description = 'New description' WHERE area_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'updated_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 5;
